title: Katie & Manu relive Lyon win with UnClassic Comms !
body_text:
Katie McCabe and Manuela Zinsberger step up to the mic for another edition of UnClassic Commentary!
Back in the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage, our Gunners stormed to a stunning 5-1 victory over defending champions Lyon.
Katie and Manu both featured on that fateful evening but now it’s time to hear their take on the match from the commentary booth.
Click play above to hear them in action!
